final_report.root_cause: The geo service process (container hotel-reserv-geo in pod geo-99d8c58c-smn2b) crashes on startup because it fails MongoDB authorization when accessing the geo-db database. Container logs show a fatal MongoDB error 'not authorized on geo-db to execute command { count: "geo", ... }' immediately after establishing a session. The authorization failure indicates either incorrect/missing DB credentials in the geo service or missing/insufficient MongoDB user privileges for the geo-db database.
